HomePage.title: Visual Editor
HomePage.subtitle: Create and edit diagrams with our modern visual editor
HomePage.featureFastDesc: Create diagrams quickly with our streamlined interface and smart tools.
HomePage.featureModernDesc: Beautiful, accessible interface that adapts to your preferences and needs.
HomePage.featureAccessibleDesc: Full support for different themes and accessibility needs including colorblind support.
HomePage.ctaDesc: Jump into our visual editor and bring your ideas to life.
HomePage.footerNote: Built with modern web technologies for the best experience.

Editor.nothingToExport: Nothing to export yet. Create or modify a shape first.

Onboarding.intro: I'll give you a quick tour so you can create diagrams like a pro.

steps.title: Canvas
steps.desc: Draw shapes, arrows and notes. Zoom with Ctrl++ / Ctrl+-.

steps.title: Toolbar
steps.desc: Use Modify, Auto-organize, Undo/Redo, Zoom and Save actions.

steps.title: Command Bar
steps.desc: Press Ctrl+K to find commands quickly.

steps.title: Themes & Language
steps.desc: Switch theme and language from the top-right controls.

steps.title: AI Generate
steps.desc: Use Videtz to generate a flow from text like: Start -> Validate, Validate -> Save.
